attributes.action: Enact a law which makes all Clubs, Groups, Associations and Secret Sociieties publish a Public Register of all members and associates on an annual basis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create an Act of Parliament which will make it mandatory for all Clubs, Associations, Groups and Secret Societies to publish an annual list of members and associates.  Failure to comply would resuslt in a substantial fine and seizure of the 'entities' property.
